# Introduction to Python Workshop

Welcome to _Introduction to Python_ !

## Modules

* 01 - [Introduction - the basics of Python](modules/intro.qmd)
* 02 - [Data analysis in Python with Pandas](modules/working_with_data.qmd)
* 03 - [Indexing and slicing](modules/indexing.qmd)
* 04 - [Missing Values](modules/missing_values.qmd)
* 05 - [Combining DataFrames in Pandas](modules/merging_data.qmd)
* 06 - [Repetitive tasks with loops](modules/loops.qmd)
* 07 - [Plotting with plotnine (ggplot)](modules/plotting_with_plotnine.qmd)
* 08 - [Reusable and modular code with functions](modules/functions.qmd)
* 09 - [Defensive Programming](modules/defensive_programming.qmd)

Some of these modules have been adapted from the original versions at
